title: How To Defend A Bank, Part 1: Fusion Centers
description: Banks & other financial institutions face a variety of security threats: from state-sponsored cyber-attacks, to smaller acts of fraud, to thousands of random malware attacks from the web. To survive in this hostile landscape,  these organizations turned to the military for inspiration.

To survive in this hostile landscape, these organizations turned to the military for inspiration.
